neduko.name: Kamado Nezuko
neduko.info:
Kamado Tanjiro's Sister.
His familly was attacked like others, and the blood of the demon enter in Nezuko.
Before becoming a demon, she was a girl with a calm heart.

tanjiro.name: Kamado Tanjiro
tanjiro.info:
Friendly boy.
To return the younger sister who became a demon to human, Join the demon killing squad, an organization of demon hunting, to defeat the family.
Good at olfactory sense, can sniff out the "smell" such as demons and other key points.
